titleStmt.title: A saint indeed: or The great work of a Christian, opened and pressed; from Prov. 4. 23 Being a seasonable and proper expedient for the recovery of the much decayed power of godliness, among the professors of these times. By John Flavell M. of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Flavel, John, 1630?-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W.R. and are to be sold by Robert Boulter, at the Turks head in Bishops-gate street, near the Great James,

notesStmt.note: With a final page of advertisement.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
